text: minisekuta dharmayada gnanayada nabitvayada allah laba dun pasu ohu minisunta “allah hæra mavama namadinu” yayi pævasimata (magak) næta. ehet (minisunta) “oba dharmaya (an ayata) uganva deminda, samudiranaya karaminda, sitime hetuven (ehi æti se) deviyan (ek kenekuvama namadina) vahalun bavata pat vanu” (yayima pavasanu æta)
